channel.title: MTU for Xbox
channel.description: Well, I've been connected with my Xbox through a wireless connection for a while now and I decided to get on today and it's telling my that I have insufficient MTU settings (need at least 1364?) - it's never told me this before. Does anyone know where I could change this on a Gateway router? I've looked everywhere.

item.title: MTU for Xbox
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:2, topic:409705”][quote author=The Soul link=topic=510982.msg3707974#msg3707974 date=1313167186]
Well, I’ve been connected with my Xbox through a wireless connection for a while now and I decided to get on today and it’s telling my that I have insufficient MTU settings (need at least 1364?) - it’s never told me this before. Does anyone know where I could change this on a Gateway router? I’ve looked everywhere.
[/quote]

This happens to me from time to time. What I do is just restart my router and it works just fine.[/quote]

Yeah it’s working now. Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: MTU for Xbox
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

The Soul:

Well, I’ve been connected with my Xbox through a wireless connection for a while now and I decided to get on today and it’s telling my that I have insufficient MTU settings (need at least 1364?) - it’s never told me this before. Does anyone know where I could change this on a Gateway router? I’ve looked everywhere.

This happens to me from time to time. What I do is just restart my router and it works just fine.
